entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
